CustomField.description: [DrawLoop] 8/14/17: Used in WF Outbound Message [Task 11630] DDP = License Face Certificate ; Delivery = SMTP - ODJFS CL Approved, SMTP - ODE CL Approved
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "FCC - Type A Home", CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "FCC - Type B Home", CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "Child Care Center") , "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a0335000002RUf0;Deploy:a0135000000kgua", IF( OR(CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "Pre School",CLQ_Program_Record_Type__c = "School Age Child Care") , "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a0335000002RUf0;Deploy:a0135000000kgvE", "") )
CustomField.label: Drawloop_Next Cont Lcs Approved
